rows.label: qst202002_msg0003
rows.name:
Indeed! These sweet people were kind
enough to help me with the shopping. I
thought we might treat them to a meal.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0004
rows.name:
Eh, what the heck. Grub's better when
you can enjoy it in good company.
Make yourselves at home.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0006
rows.name:
He's not the spring chicken he used
to be, but he was once quite the
formidable warrior, believe it or not!

rows.label: qst202002_msg0007
rows.name:
I suppose you could call this his
retirement home. Just don't tell
him that, tee hee...

rows.label: qst202002_msg0009
rows.name: You can tell they get on well together.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll start preparing dinner then, shall I?
Won't be long!

rows.label: qst202002_msg0011
rows.name: Is there anything we can help you with?

rows.label: qst202002_msg0012
rows.name: Oh, well now that you mention it...

rows.label: qst202002_msg0013
rows.name: How about fetching us some firewood?

rows.label: qst202002_msg0015
rows.name:
Just talk to Edward down at Saets
Lumber Co. He's always happy to
give us some.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0016
rows.name: Thank you so much for all this!
